series.name: 葬送のフリーレン / Frieren: Beyond Journey's End

cards.title: Journey's End, Frieren
cards.description: When placed on stage you may heal 1 damage. CX combo On attack choose one opponent's character and send it to stock.

cards.title: Wandering Mage, Frieren
cards.description: When this card attacks draw a card then discard a card.

cards.title: Quiet Smile, Frieren
cards.description: During your turn if you have another Mage character this card gains +2000 power.

cards.title: Time-Honed Magic, Frieren
cards.description: On play look at up to the top three cards of your deck and add one to hand.

cards.title: Evening Campfire, Frieren
cards.description: Act Rest this card: choose one of your characters and it gains +1500 power until end of turn.

cards.title: Sunflower Field, Frieren
cards.description: When this card becomes reversed you may pay 1 and send it to memory. At the start of your next draw phase return it rested.

cards.title: Disciplined Apprentice, Fern
cards.description: When this card is placed on stage from hand you may draw a card then discard a card.

cards.title: Staff Technique, Fern
cards.description: On attack this card gains +2000 power for the turn.

cards.title: Everyday Clothes, Fern
cards.description: When this card attacks reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Mage character add it to hand.

cards.title: Faithful Apprentice, Fern
cards.description: CX combo When this card attacks if "Teacher and Student" is in your climax zone this card gains +3500 power and burn 1 damage.

cards.title: Worry Lines, Fern
cards.description: During your opponent's turn this card gains +2000 power if you have another Warrior or Mage character.

cards.title: Journey's Support, Fern
cards.description: When this card is placed on stage you may salvage a Mage or Warrior character from your waiting room.

cards.title: Traveling Warrior, Stark
cards.description: When this card attacks if you control another Warrior character this card gains +2000 power.

cards.title: Big Eater, Stark
cards.description: When this card is reversed you may pay 1 to send it to memory and return it at the start of your next draw phase.

cards.title: Defender of the Party, Stark
cards.description: On attack give another character +1000 power and hand encore until end of turn.

cards.title: Thunderous Blow, Stark
cards.description: CX combo On attack with "Heroic Smash" give this card +4000 power and burn 1 damage.

cards.title: Waking Up Late, Stark
cards.description: When played from hand choose one of your characters and it gains +1000 power and +1 soul.

cards.title: Shield Breaker, Stark
cards.description: When this card enters the stage you may pay 1 to rest one opponent's character.

cards.title: Legendary Hero, Himmel
cards.description: When this card attacks if you have two or more other characters this card gains +2000 power.

cards.title: Smile that Saved the World, Himmel
cards.description: When this card is placed on stage choose one of your characters and it gains +1500 power for the turn.

cards.title: Hero of the North, Himmel
cards.description: On attack you may pay 1 to salvage a Heroic character.

cards.title: Final Farewell, Himmel
cards.description: When placed on stage heal 1 damage and give one of your characters +3000 power.

cards.title: Statue of a Hero, Himmel
cards.description: Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +1000 power.

cards.title: Tales Retold, Himmel
cards.description: During your turn all of your other characters get +1000 power.

cards.title: Kindly Priest, Heiter
cards.description: When this card is played from hand reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Spell card add it to hand.

cards.title: Tipsy Advice, Heiter
cards.description: Brainstorm Pay 1 rest this card: reveal four cards, add a Mage character for each climax revealed.

cards.title: Secret Guardian, Heiter
cards.description: On play choose one of your characters and it gains +2000 power and hand encore.

cards.title: Blessing of Spirits, Heiter
cards.description: When this card attacks if you have another Priest character you may heal 1 damage.

cards.title: Late Night Prayer, Heiter
cards.description: When this card is placed on stage choose a character in your waiting room and put it on top of your deck.

cards.title: Final Words, Heiter
cards.description: When this card is placed on stage you may pay 1 to search your deck for a Frieren or Fern character.

cards.title: Dwarven Warrior, Eisen
cards.description: When this card attacks it gains +1000 power until end of turn for each other Warrior character.

cards.title: Quiet Strength, Eisen
cards.description: When this card becomes reversed you may rest it.

cards.title: Shield Formation, Eisen
cards.description: When this card is placed on stage choose one of your characters and it gains +3000 power for the turn.

cards.title: Valiant Guardian, Eisen
cards.description: CX combo On attack you may pay 1 to put the top card of your deck into stock and give this card +3500 power.

cards.title: Smithy Visit, Eisen
cards.description: When this card is placed on stage draw a card then discard a card.

cards.title: Legacy of the Hero Party, Eisen
cards.description: During your opponent's turn this card gains +3000 power.

cards.title: Traveling Priest, Sein
cards.description: When played you may salvage a Priest character from your waiting room.

cards.title: Wandering Healer, Sein
cards.description: Act Rest this card: choose one of your characters and heal 1 damage.

cards.title: Reluctant Companion, Sein
cards.description: During your turn this card gains +1500 power if you have a Mage character.

cards.title: Perfect Timing, Sein
cards.description: When this card attacks if you control another Priest character you may give one character +3500 power for the turn.

cards.title: Travel Log, Sein
cards.description: When this card is placed on stage you may mill two cards. If there was a climax among them draw a card.

cards.title: New Journey, Sein
cards.description: When this card enters the stage you may pay 1 to salvage up to two characters.

cards.title: Warrior of the North, Übel
cards.description: When played this card gains +2000 power until end of turn.

cards.title: Confrontational Stare, Übel
cards.description: On attack look at the top card of your deck and either keep or send to waiting room.

cards.title: Unrefined Talent, Übel
cards.description: When this card becomes reversed you may pay 1 to rest it and it gets +1500 power for the turn.

cards.title: Duelist's Pride, Übel
cards.description: When this card attacks if you control another Warrior character this card gains +4000 power until end of turn.

cards.title: Practice Swing, Übel
cards.description: During your turn this card gains +1500 power.

cards.title: Training Under Frieren, Übel
cards.description: When this card is placed on stage you may draw a card then discard a card.

cards.title: Ice Mage, Lawine
cards.description: When played reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Magic character add it to hand.

cards.title: Avalanche Trigger, Lawine
cards.description: During your turn this card gains +2000 power.

cards.title: Rookie Mage, Lawine
cards.description: When this card becomes reversed you may pay 1 to salvage a Magic character.

cards.title: Frozen Barrage, Lawine
cards.description: When this card attacks you may choose one of your opponent's characters and it gets -2000 power until end of turn.

cards.title: Snowfield Memories, Lawine
cards.description: When this card is placed on stage draw a card then discard a card.

cards.title: Twin Study Session, Lawine & Kanne
cards.description: When this card enters the stage salvage a Mage or Warrior character.

cards.title: Water Mage, Kanne
cards.description: On play choose one of your characters and it gains +2000 power for the turn.

cards.title: Splash of Courage, Kanne
cards.description: When this card attacks if you control another Mage character this card gains +2500 power.

cards.title: Strong-Willed Novice, Kanne
cards.description: When this card becomes reversed you may rest it.

cards.title: Resonant Tides, Kanne
cards.description: CX combo On attack with "Flowing Rhythm" heal 1 damage.

cards.title: Apprenticeship Day, Fern & Stark
cards.description: When played choose one of your characters and it gains +1000 power and +1 soul.

cards.title: Promise at the Monument
cards.description: When this card is placed on stage from hand you may heal 1 damage. All of your characters get +1000 power for the turn.
